snippet: Patti S. Hart, the Yahoo director who headed the board search committee that picked Scott Thompson as the company’s chief executive, will not stand for re-election.
abstract: Patti S. Hart, the Yahoo director who headed the board search committee that picked Scott Thompson as the company’s chief executive, will not stand for re-election.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and EVELYN M. RUSLI

headline.main: Yahoo Director Who Headed C.E.O. Search Committee to Stand Down
